content.desc: These are the open source libraries we use to make this forum:

section.first_section_desc: DeepL Translator to translate your texts with the best machine translation available, powered by DeepL's world-leading neural network technology.
section.second_section_desc: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS- and (optionally) JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

section.first_section_desc: Preview our Discord server through the Widget
section.second_section_desc: Hi My Name Is RealPenguin im the owner of a discord server name Club Jerry And the creator this forum :)
